title: Ryan Reynolds might just have shared the first snap of his and Blake Lively's new baby
text:
Ryan Reynolds might just have shared the first snap of his and Blake Lively's new baby

Cape Town – Ryan Reynold's shared a picture of himself and an adorable tiny tot that might just be he and Blake Lively's newborn baby.

The celebrity couple welcomed a new baby girl earlier this year to the surprise of many as they kept the pregnancy under wraps from the public eye. US Weekly reports that the baby is two months old.

In the photo - shared on Ryan's Twitter account on Thursday - look at each other lovingly, as they hold the baby whose face is covered.

Along with the family photo, the Deadpool star used the social media platform to share an important message about climate change.

He wrote in part: "I want my daughters to experience the same natural playground I grew up in,".

SEE THE PICTURE OF RYAN, BLAKE AND THE BABY HERE:

Compiled by Alex Isaacs. (Sources: US Weekly, Channel24)
description: The celebrity couple welcomed a new baby girl earlier this year to the surprise of many.
